title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection
text_raw:
1. 

(1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection 

of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Protection of Animals 
used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 434 of 
2013), the Regulations of 2014, the European Union (Protection of Animals 
used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 552 of 
2016), the Regulations of 2018 and these Regulations may be cited together as 
the European Union (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) 
Regulations 2012 to 2020. 

Definitions

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Protection of 
Animals used for Scientific Purposes) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 543 
of 2012); 

“Regulations of 2014” means the European Union (Protection of 
Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2014 
(S.I. No. 174 of 2014); 

“Regulations of 2018” means the European Union (Protection of 
Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2018 
(S.I. No. 553 of 2018). 

1 OJ No. L 276, 20.10.2010, p. 33. 
2 OJ No. L 170, 25.6.2019, p. 115. 
3 OJ No. L 129, 24.4.2020, p. 16. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st September, 2020.

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: 3. Regulation 3(1) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 3(1) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 
2018) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting after the definition 
of “IMB” the following definition: 

“‘Implementing Decision’ means Commission Implementing Decision 
(EU) 2020/569 of 16 April 20203;”. 

Amendment of Regulation 33
text_norm: 3 regulation 3(1) (as amended regulation 3 regulation 2018) principal regulation amended inserting definition imb following definition implementing decision mean commission implementing decision (eu) 2020 569 16 april 20203  amendment regulation 33

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: 4. Regulation 33 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
4. Regulation 33 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 

for paragraph (4) the following paragraphs: 

“(4) From 1 January 2021, where a retrospective assessment is 
required pursuant to paragraph (3), the non-technical project summary 
shall be updated by the IMB within 6 months of the completion of the 
retrospective assessment with the results thereof. 

(5) Until 31 December 2020, the IMB shall publish the nontechnical project summaries of authorised projects and any updates 
thereto. 

(6) From 1 January 2021, the IMB shall submit for publication the 
non-technical project summaries of authorised projects, at the latest 
within 6 months of authorisation, and any updates thereto, by 
electronic transfer to the Commission. 

(7) For the purpose of paragraph (6), the IMB shall submit the 
information specified in Annex I to the Implementing Decision using 
the database established by the Commission in accordance with the 
third sentence of Article 43(4) of the Directive and the non-technical 
project summaries, and updates thereto, shall correspond to the 
templates laid down in the said Annex.”. 

Amendment of Regulation 52

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: 7. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation
text_raw:
7. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting for Regulation 

68 (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2014) the following: 

“Provision of statistical data
text_norm: 7 principal regulation amended substituting regulation 68 (as amended regulation 3 regulation 2014) following provision statistical data

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: 68. (1) The IMB shall collect and make publicly available, on an
text_raw:
68. (1) The IMB shall collect and make publicly available, on an 
annual basis, statistical information on the use of animals in 
procedures, including information on the actual severity of the 
procedures and on the origin and species of non-human primates used 
in procedures. 

(2) The IMB shall submit to the Commission, at the latest by 10 
November the following year, the statistical information collected 
pursuant to paragraph (1), as specified in Annex III to the 
Implementing Decision, using the database established by the 
Commission in accordance with the first sentence of the third 
subparagraph of Article 54(2) of the Directive.”. 

Amendment of Regulation 69

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: 69. The IMB shall submit to the Commission, on an annual basis,
text_raw:
69. The IMB shall submit to the Commission, on an annual basis, 
detailed information on exemptions granted under Regulation 8(4)(a), 
as specified in Annex IV to the Implementing Decision, using the 
template laid down in that Annex.”.

title: giving full effect to Article 6 of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Protection of Animals used for 
Scientific Purposes) Regulations 2012, primarily to give full effect to Article 6 
of Regulation (EU) 2019/1010 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 5 June 2019 and Commission Implementing Decision (EU) 2020/569 of 16 
April 2020. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection of Animals 
used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [324] 7
